secretary.name: Priya Sharma
secretary.title: Project Secretary
secretary.bio: Leading our NSS initiatives with passion and dedication. Committed to creating lasting impact in the community through education and empowerment programs. With 3 years of experience in social work and community development.

executives.name: Rahul Verma
executives.title: Operations & Logistics
executives.bio: Managing day-to-day operations and coordinating volunteer activities. Ensures smooth execution of all project events and maintains relationships with partner organizations.

executives.name: Ananya Desai
executives.title: Community Outreach
executives.bio: Building bridges with local communities and establishing partnerships. Specializes in program development and stakeholder engagement to maximize our social impact.

executives.name: Arjun Patel
executives.title: Communications & Media
executives.bio: Crafting compelling narratives and managing our digital presence. Handles all communications, social media strategy, and documentation of our community initiatives.
